original_solution_mapping.L1: If Evan had 200 books two years ago, he currently has 200-40 = <<200-40=160>>160 books.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In five years, Evan will have 60 more than 160*5 = 800 books which is the number he has now.
original_solution_mapping.L3: This means Evan will have 800+60 = <<800+60=860>>860 books in five years.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3488.
    Returns: the total number of books Evan will have in five years.
    """
    # L1
    books_two_years_ago = 200 # 200 books two years ago
    fewer_books_now = 40 # 40 fewer books than the number he had 2 years ago
    current_books = books_two_years_ago - fewer_books_now

    # L2
    multiplier_five_times = 5 # five times as many books
    five_times_current_books = current_books * multiplier_five_times

    # L3
    additional_books_in_five_years = 60 # 60 more than five times as many books
    total_books_in_five_years = five_times_current_books + additional_books_in_five_years

    # FA
    answer = total_books_in_five_years
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If Evan had {books_two_years_ago} books two years ago, he currently has {books_two_years_ago}-{fewer_books_now} = <<{books_two_years_ago}-{fewer_books_now}={current_books}>>{current_books} books.
In five years, Evan will have 60 more than {current_books}*{multiplier_five_times} = {five_times_current_books} books which is the number he has now.

This means Evan will have {five_times_current_books}+{additional_books_in_five_years} = <<{five_times_current_books}+{additional_books_in_five_years}={total_books_in_five_years}>>{total_books_in_five_years} books in five years.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: If Evan had 200 books two years ago, he currently has 200-40 = <<200-40=160>>160 books.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: In five years, Evan will have 60 more than 160*5 = 800 books which is the number he has now.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: This means Evan will have 160+60 = <<160+60=220>>220 books in five years.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'current_books' (value: 160) was used instead of 'five_times_current_books' (value: 800).
